edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.testing

Class TESTReconfigurationClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.utils.DefaultTest
      • edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.testing.TESTReconfigurationClient

  • public class TESTReconfigurationClient
extends DefaultTest
    Author:
    arun This class is designed to test all client commands including creation, deletion, request actives, and app requests to names.

      • test20_RandomActiveReplicaDeleteAfterAdd

        public void test20_RandomActiveReplicaDeleteAfterAdd()
                                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        Addition of a random active replica succeeds (as it appears to other nodes as simply failed). Nothing bad will happen as long as a majority of replicas in each group is available.

        java.io.IOException
